events.title: Joined InnoWell
events.content: Digging deep into tech again – joining as Senior Front End Developer on the Digital team.

events.title: Engineering Lead, DOPS
events.content: Making it official – managing a team of talented engineers in operationalising Design at Finder.

events.title: Joined Finder
events.content: Building the Design System of Australia's biggest comparison site.

events.title: Moved to San Francisco
events.content: Building the Design System and Theme Engine with BC's UI Platform team.

events.title: First talk at SydCSS
events.content: The Thing About vertical-align, back in the dark ages before I was allowed flexbox.

events.title: Joined BigCommerce
events.content: Building the first responsive storefront themes, theming libraries and the Style Editor.

events.title: Graduated!
events.content: Bachelor of IT, Web Development major – WSU (ex UWS).

events.title: Joined Solutions Outsourced, SiteFlex
events.content: SiteFlex Support, eCommerce site specialist. My love affair with CSS begins.

events.title: 2 units of Animation
events.content: "Dude, you could bring all this shit into your websites! It's the future, man!" – Rodney D'Silva

events.title: Watched Minority Report
events.content: "I wonder if I could build UIs for a living?"
